stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. The Corp may look at the top 4 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Reveal the top 4 cards of R&D.
text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
The Corp may look at the top 4 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
Reveal the top 4 cards of R&D.
title: Insight
